name: The Invisible Pink Unicorn
description: This is an NFT-version of a work from my documentary project «Big case» about real administrative and criminal cases resulting from misuse of Russia's anti-extremist legislation.  The so-called «anti-extremist legislation» consists of various articles and norms but due to its obscure wording opens up wide opportunities for rendering and using it in the way that suppresses the freedom of speech, assembly and association, freedom of information and freedom of conscience.
